title: Advanced iOS Programming
headline: This free online programming course takes you through all aspects of tailoring iOS for your mobile clients’ needs.
description: Over the past decade, there has been an increase in the demand for iOS app developers due to more companies adopting a mobile-first approach. iOS developers must be well-versed in iOS and how it interacts with various Apple devices, as well as be able to tailor their applications to their clients’ needs. In this course, we've gathered essential knowledge and resources to help you understand how to excel at iOS mobile development.

courseDescription:
Do you want to learn how to create applications for iOS and Apple devices? This course provides advanced skills and methods for coding iOS applications. We begin by teaching you how to access remote data using JSON, and read and parse data using the PHfetch result. Learn how to perform various iOS media operations such as recording videos, audios, and playing recordings. Then see how to use the ImagePicker to select and capture images from the library and how to access the iOS media library.

You will also learn how to configure the iOS GPS and mapping system, how to program an application that converts physical street addresses into latitude and longitude using geocoding, and how to calculate distance using the MapKit. Study how to obtain users' current location, and how to get users' motion data using the accelerometer, gyroscope, and compass. Discover numerous social networking capabilities in an iOS app that uses the UIActivityViewController and SLRequest, and learn how to use the Facebook SDK. Finally, we will show you how to set up CloudKit and produce hosted content, as well as how to configure the iOS in-app purchase option and set up iAD.

This course is a perfect tool for programmers who want to learn how to create apps for iOS devices. It will set you apart from the crowd by assisting you in mastering JSON coding, providing you with a competitive advantage. The material covers remote data access, conducting media operations, GPS and mapping systems, writing a program that posts to several social networks using SLRequests, and configuring in-app purchasing and iAD. Enroll today and you'll be ready to code in no time.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our certificate pricing, please visit our Pricing Page

modules.name: Module
modules.details: Remote Data Access and iOS Media
modules.description: In this module, you will be introduced to remote data access and JSON. You will learn to parse JSON into objects that applications can use, read JSON files locally, and how to retrieve the data from a remote service. You will also learn how to create an image gallery, play, and record videos as well as how to access users' media libraries.
topics: Remote Data Access and iOS Media - Learning Outcomes
Remote Data Access and iOS Media - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.details: iOS GPS Mapping and Motion Framework
modules.description: In this module, you'll learn how to get GPS and map data, display maps, and get directions. You'll also learn about geocoding and the map kit tool, as well as how to use location services, calculate distances and display your current location. You'll learn how to use the motion framework and get data from the accelerometer and gyroscope.
topics: iOS GPS Mapping and Motion Framework - Learning Outcomes
iOS GPS and Mapping Part One
iOS GPS and Mapping - Part Two
iOS GPS Mapping and Motion Framework - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.details: iOS Social Networking, CloudKit and In-App Purchasing
modules.description: In this module, you be introduced to social networking options and you will learn the steps needed to set up Cloud kit, you will learn about in-app purchasing, purchase types, and how to make purchase flow. You will also learn how to validate receipts and how to make money using iAd.
topics: iOS Social Networking, and CloudKit  - Learning Outcomes
iOS Social Networking, and CloudKit - Lesson Summary
